verses.verse: And He entered <S%G1525><s%> and was passing <S%G1330><s%> through <S%G1330><s%> Jericho. <S%G2410><s%>

And behold, <S%G2400><s%> there was a man <S%G435><s%> called <S%G2564><s%> by the name <S%G3686><s%> of Zaccheus; <S%G2195><s%> and he was a chief <S%G754><s%> tax-gatherer, and he was rich. <S%G4145><s%>

And he was trying <S%G2212><s%> to see <S%G3708><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was, and he was unable <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> because <S%G575><s%> of the crowd, <S%G3793><s%> for he was small <S%G3398><s%> in stature. <S%G2244><s%>

And he ran <S%G4390><s%> on ahead <S%G1715><s%> and climbed <S%G305><s%> up into a sycamore <S%G4809><s%> tree <S%G4809><s%> in order <S%G2443><s%> to see <S%G3708><s%> Him, for He was about <S%G3195><s%> to pass <S%G1330><s%> through <S%G1330><s%> that way.

And when <S%G5613><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to the place, <S%G5117><s%> He looked <S%G308><s%> up and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Zaccheus, <S%G2195><s%> hurry <S%G4692><s%> and come <S%G2597><s%> down, <S%G2597><s%> for today <S%G4594><s%> I must <S%G1163><s%> stay <S%G3306><s%> at your house. <S%G3624><s%>"
And he hurried <S%G4692><s%> and came <S%G2597><s%> down, <S%G2597><s%> and received <S%G5264><s%> Him gladly. <S%G5463><s%>

And when they saw <S%G3708><s%> it, they all <S%G3956><s%> [began] to grumble, <S%G1234><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "He has gone <S%G1525><s%> to be the guest <S%G2647><s%> of a man <S%G435><s%> who is a sinner. <S%G268><s%>"

And Zaccheus <S%G2195><s%> stopped <S%G2476><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> "Behold, <S%G2400><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> half <S%G2255><s%> of my possessions <S%G5225><s%> I will give <S%G1325><s%> to the poor, <S%G4434><s%> and if <S%G1487><s%> I have defrauded <S%G4811><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> of anything, <S%G5100><s%> I will give <S%G591><s%> back <S%G591><s%> four <S%G5073><s%> times <S%G5073><s%> as much. <S%G5073><s%>"

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Today <S%G4594><s%> salvation <S%G4991><s%> has come <S%G1096><s%> to this <S%G3778><s%> house, <S%G3624><s%> because <S%G2530><s%> he, too, <S%G2532><s%> is a son <S%G5207><s%> of Abraham. <S%G11><s%>
"For the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> has come <S%G2064><s%> to seek <S%G2212><s%> and to save <S%G4982><s%> that which was lost. <S%G622><s%>"

And while they were listening <S%G191><s%> to these <S%G3778><s%> things, <S%G3778><s%> He went <S%G4369><s%> on to tell <S%G3004><s%> a parable, <S%G3850><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> He was near <S%G1451><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> and they supposed <S%G1380><s%> that the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> was going <S%G3195><s%> to appear <S%G398><s%> immediately. <S%G3916><s%>

He said <S%G3004><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> "A certain <S%G5100><s%> nobleman <S%G2104><s%> <S%G444><s%> went <S%G4198><s%> to a distant <S%G3117><s%> country <S%G5561><s%> to receive <S%G2983><s%> a kingdom <S%G932><s%> for himself, <S%G1438><s%> and [then] return. <S%G5290><s%>

"And he called <S%G2564><s%> ten <S%G1176><s%> of his slaves, <S%G1401><s%> and gave <S%G1325><s%> them ten <S%G1176><s%> minas, <S%G3414><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, 'Do <S%G4231><s%> business <S%G4231><s%> [with this] until <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> I come <S%G2064><s%> [back.]'

"But his citizens <S%G4177><s%> hated <S%G3404><s%> him, and sent <S%G649><s%> a delegation <S%G4242><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> 'We do not want <S%G2309><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> man <S%G3778><s%> to reign <S%G936><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> us.'

"And it came <S%G1096><s%> about that when <S%G1722><s%> he returned, <S%G1880><s%> after receiving <S%G2983><s%> the kingdom, <S%G932><s%> he ordered <S%G3004><s%> that these <S%G3778><s%> slaves, <S%G1401><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> he had given <S%G1325><s%> the money, <S%G694><s%> be called <S%G5455><s%> to him in order <S%G2443><s%> that he might know <S%G1097><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> business <S%G1281><s%> they had done. <S%G1281><s%>

"And the first <S%G4413><s%> appeared, <S%G3854><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> 'Master, <S%G2962><s%> your mina <S%G3414><s%> has made <S%G4333><s%> ten <S%G1176><s%> minas <S%G3414><s%> more. <S%G4333><s%>'

"And he said <S%G3004><s%> to him, 'Well <S%G1065><s%> <S%G2095><s%> done, <S%G2095><s%> good <S%G18><s%> slave, <S%G1401><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> you have been <S%G1096><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> in a very <S%G1646><s%> little <S%G1646><s%> thing, <S%G1646><s%> be in authority <S%G1849><s%> over <S%G1883><s%> ten <S%G1176><s%> cities. <S%G4172><s%>'
"And the second <S%G1208><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> 'Your mina, <S%G3414><s%> master, <S%G2962><s%> has made <S%G4160><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> minas. <S%G3414><s%>'
"And he said <S%G3004><s%> to him also, <S%G2532><s%> 'And you are to be over <S%G1883><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> cities. <S%G4172><s%>'

"And another <S%G2087><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> 'Master, <S%G2962><s%> behold <S%G2400><s%> your mina, <S%G3414><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I kept <S%G2192><s%> put <S%G606><s%> away <S%G606><s%> in a handkerchief; <S%G4676><s%>

for I was afraid <S%G5399><s%> of you, because <S%G3754><s%> you are an exacting <S%G840><s%> man; <S%G444><s%> you take <S%G142><s%> up what <S%G3739><s%> you did not lay <S%G5087><s%> down, <S%G5087><s%> and reap <S%G2325><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> you did not sow. <S%G4687><s%>'

"He said <S%G3004><s%> to him, 'By your own words <S%G4750><s%> I will judge <S%G2919><s%> you, you worthless <S%G4190><s%> slave. <S%G1401><s%> Did you know <S%G3609><s%> that I am <S%G1510><s%> an exacting <S%G840><s%> man, <S%G444><s%> taking <S%G142><s%> up what <S%G3739><s%> I did not lay <S%G5087><s%> down, <S%G5087><s%> and reaping <S%G2325><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> I did not sow <S%G4687><s%>?

'Then <S%G2532><s%> why <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5101><s%> did you not put <S%G1325><s%> the money <S%G694><s%> in the bank, <S%G5132><s%> and having come, <S%G2064><s%> I would have collected <S%G4238><s%> it with interest <S%G5110><s%>?'

"And he said <S%G3004><s%> to the bystanders, <S%G3936><s%> 'Take <S%G142><s%> the mina <S%G3414><s%> away <S%G142><s%> from him, and give <S%G1325><s%> it to the one who has <S%G2192><s%> the ten <S%G1176><s%> minas. <S%G3414><s%>'
"And they said <S%G3004><s%> to him, 'Master, <S%G2962><s%> he has <S%G2192><s%> ten <S%G1176><s%> minas <S%G3414><s%> [already.]'

"I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, that to everyone <S%G3956><s%> who has <S%G2192><s%> shall [more] be given, <S%G1325><s%> but from the one who does not have, <S%G2192><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> he does have <S%G2192><s%> shall be taken <S%G142><s%> away. <S%G142><s%>

"But these <S%G3778><s%> enemies <S%G2190><s%> of mine, <S%G1473><s%> who did not want <S%G2309><s%> me to reign <S%G936><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> them, bring <S%G71><s%> them here <S%G5602><s%> and slay <S%G2695><s%> them in my presence. <S%G1715><s%>"
And after He had said <S%G3004><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things, <S%G3778><s%> He was going <S%G4198><s%> on ahead, <S%G1715><s%> ascending <S%G305><s%> to Jerusalem. <S%G2414><s%>

And it came <S%G1096><s%> about that when <S%G5613><s%> He approached <S%G1448><s%> Bethphage <S%G967><s%> and Bethany, <S%G963><s%> near <S%G4314><s%> the mount <S%G3735><s%> that is called <S%G2564><s%> Olivet, <S%G1638><s%> He sent <S%G649><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> of the disciples, <S%G3101><s%>

saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Go <S%G5217><s%> into the village <S%G2968><s%> opposite <S%G2713><s%> [you,] in which <S%G3739><s%> as you enter <S%G1531><s%> you will find <S%G2147><s%> a colt <S%G4454><s%> tied, <S%G1210><s%> on which <S%G3739><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G444><s%> <S%G3762><s%> yet <S%G4455><s%> has ever <S%G4455><s%> sat; <S%G2523><s%> untie <S%G3089><s%> it, and bring <S%G71><s%> it [here.]

"And if <S%G1437><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> asks <S%G2065><s%> you, 'Why <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5101><s%> are you untying <S%G3089><s%> it?' thus <S%G3779><s%> shall you speak, <S%G3004><s%> 'The Lord <S%G2962><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> of it.'"
And those <S%G3588><s%> who were sent <S%G649><s%> went <S%G565><s%> away <S%G565><s%> and found <S%G2147><s%> it just <S%G2531><s%> as He had told <S%G3004><s%> them.
And as they were untying <S%G3089><s%> the colt, <S%G4454><s%> its owners <S%G2962><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Why <S%G5101><s%> are you untying <S%G3089><s%> the colt <S%G4454><s%>?"
And they said, <S%G3004><s%> "The Lord <S%G2962><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> of it."
And they brought <S%G71><s%> it to Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and they threw <S%G1977><s%> their garments <S%G2440><s%> on the colt, <S%G4454><s%> and put <S%G1913><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> [on it.]
And as He was going, <S%G4198><s%> they were spreading <S%G5291><s%> their garments <S%G2440><s%> in the road. <S%G3598><s%>

And as He was now <S%G2235><s%> approaching, <S%G1448><s%> near <S%G4314><s%> the descent <S%G2600><s%> of the Mount <S%G3735><s%> of Olives, <S%G1636><s%> the whole <S%G537><s%> multitude <S%G4128><s%> of the disciples <S%G3101><s%> began <S%G757><s%> to praise <S%G134><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> joyfully <S%G5463><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> for all <S%G3956><s%> the miracles <S%G1411><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> they had seen, <S%G3708><s%>

saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Blessed <S%G2127><s%> is the King <S%G935><s%> who comes <S%G2064><s%> in the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord; <S%G2962><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> in heaven <S%G3772><s%> and glory <S%G1391><s%> in the highest! <S%G5310><s%>"
And some <S%G5100><s%> of the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> in the multitude <S%G3793><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> rebuke <S%G2008><s%> Your disciples. <S%G3101><s%>"

And He answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, if <S%G1437><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> become <S%G4623><s%> silent, <S%G4623><s%> the stones <S%G3037><s%> will cry <S%G2896><s%> out!"
And when <S%G5613><s%> He approached, <S%G1448><s%> He saw <S%G3708><s%> the city <S%G4172><s%> and wept <S%G2799><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> it,

saying, <S%G3004><s%> "If <S%G1487><s%> you had known <S%G1097><s%> in this <S%G3778><s%> day, <S%G2250><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> you, the things which make for peace! <S%G1515><s%> But now <S%G3568><s%> they have been hidden <S%G2928><s%> from your eyes. <S%G3788><s%>

"For the days <S%G2250><s%> shall come <S%G2240><s%> upon you when <S%G2532><s%> your enemies <S%G2190><s%> will throw <S%G3925><s%> up a bank <S%G5482><s%> before you, and surround <S%G4033><s%> you, and hem <S%G4912><s%> you in on every <S%G3840><s%> side, <S%G3840><s%>

and will level <S%G1474><s%> you to the ground <S%G1474><s%> and your children <S%G5043><s%> within <S%G1722><s%> you, and they will not leave <S%G863><s%> in you one stone <S%G3037><s%> upon another, <S%G3037><s%> because <S%G473><s%> <S%G3739><s%> you did not recognize <S%G1097><s%> the time <S%G2540><s%> of your visitation. <S%G1984><s%> "
And He entered <S%G1525><s%> the temple <S%G2413><s%> and began <S%G757><s%> to cast <S%G1544><s%> out those <S%G3588><s%> who were selling, <S%G4453><s%>

saying <S%G3004><s%> to them, " It is written, <S%G1125><s%> 'And My house <S%G3624><s%> shall be a house <S%G3624><s%> of prayer, <S%G4335><s%>' but you have made <S%G4160><s%> it a robbers' den. <S%G4693><s%>"

And He was teaching <S%G1321><s%> daily <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2250><s%> in the temple; <S%G2413><s%> but the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and the scribes <S%G1122><s%> and the leading <S%G4413><s%> men <S%G4413><s%> among the people <S%G2992><s%> were trying <S%G2212><s%> to destroy <S%G622><s%> Him,
and they could not find <S%G2147><s%> anything <S%G5101><s%> that they might do, <S%G4160><s%> for all <S%G537><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> were hanging <S%G1582><s%> upon His words. <S%G191><s%>
